title: Which is the best all-rounder phone in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: You asked us, best phone in terms of overall performance in 2020. If you are not a game player then I will prefer to buy Samsung m31 one but that's not a budget mobile. I personally feel poco M2 Pro good choice because which comes with 720G processor and technology is 8 NM.

Here you go Irrespective of the price My first set of suggestions: Samsung Galaxy S20/S20 Plus/S20 Ultra.LG V60 ThinQ 5G.OnePlus 8/8 Pro.OnePlus Nord.Samsung Galaxy Note 10/10 Plus.Apple iPhone 11 Pro/Pro Max.Google Pixel 4A.Apple iPhone 11.Google Pixel 4 XL and Pixel 4. ANDHTC 12+. Now here you go A list of Pocket friendly ones: Poco X2Realme 6i/Pro.Motorola One Fusion Plus.Redmi Note 9 Pro Max.Samsung Galaxy M31.Poco M2 pro.Realme 5 Pro.Redmi Note 9.Realme Narzo 10.Samsung Galaxy M30s.Vivo U20.Redmi 8.and so onn.Happy Shopping<3 ;P →Ananthakrishnan
